class_notes: FREN 313 French and Francophone Culture (Prof. Bulakites / TTh 11:30am-12:45pm (in person) Content: Various aspects of contemporary French culture and society are studied through newspapers, film, and cultural documents. Discussions will be encouraged, and written skills perfected through short topical papers.
